## TGlBasicEntityRenderer type

Either wgl1 or wgl2, without extensions by default.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TGlBasicEntityRenderer<TExts extends TGlExtensionKeys = never> = TGl1EntityRenderer<TExts> | TGl2EntityRenderer<TExts>;
```
